data.displayName: Freedom Business Single Rate with Demand (8300)

fees.description: $22.20 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$0.00 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected during business hours. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$0.00 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected during business hours. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) (inc. GST) Direct Credit or Debit dishonour payment fee
A 0.73% (inc. GST) fee may apply to payments made by debit and credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.

discounts.description: Discounts applied to GST inclusive energy usage charges. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component.

electricityContract.variation: We may vary the charges of this plan (including their amount, nature and structure) at any time by giving you a notice at least 10 business days prior to the effective date of variation.All prices listed are inclusive of GST except where indicated.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kVA (c/kVA Daily). Uses the maximum kVA consumption from the meter readings within the period Any time.

greenPowerCharges.description: For an extra 1.375�/kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 25% of your usage will be accredited renewable energy from the grid from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component. Please contact us on 1300 689 866 for more information.

For an extra 2.75�/kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 50% of your usage will be accredited renewable energy from the grid from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component. Please contact us on 1300 689 866 for more information.

For an extra 5.5�/kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your usage will be accredited renewable energy from the grid from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component. Please contact us on 1300 689 866 for more information.
